column4: i was in here yesterday and someone was trying to update their server but they had a LTS version and their updates would only update to the newest LTS. Someone said to change a value from 'lts' to 'normal' where is that change supposed to be made? (my system only went to 10.04, not 10.10 and i think this may be the reason)
what about it isn't working zkriesse ?
Isn't copying and then moving the file
are you sure the files exist?
